ygData.subject: Re: Praise Bertoxxulos
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t bother the brothers.  The paladins you are looking for are running a race on the path they are on.  If you wait long enough one will pass by. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Don't bother the brothers. The paladins you are looking for are running a race on the path they are on. If you wait long enough one will pass by.

----- Original Message -----
From: Liet
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 1:34 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Praise Bertoxxulos


My name is Foolsgawd and I play on tunare
I just died and my corpse vanished for some awfull bug and GMs never answer my petitions.
I realized how weak I am without armor at level 10
buying another fullset of leather is gonna be hard
I wanted to know about the SK quests in queynos.
The guildmaster in the sewers (he smelled REAL nasty) told me to meet commander kane
Commander kane told me to kill young paladins in karrana plains
I went there and the first npc I saw was Brother Trintle or something (Blond hair)
killed him and gave the busted prayer beads to the guildmaster and DOH he killed me cuz brutha Trintle was our spy amongst the temple of life.
This boosts your faction standing with queynos guards and merchant so its not so bad cuz the other paladins will get it down.
So I headed back to karrana plains and there was another Npc (No armor , dark hair and beard) killed him and he gave me nothing...but faction standing got worse
I waited a bit and another Npc came out of nowhere (leather armor , dark hair , unbearded) killed him and he gave me the prayer beads
I gave them to the GM and nothing happened
I killed all the NPCs AGAIN and gave the beads to Commander Kane in the sewers....
still nothing.....How the hell do I complete this quest ???
